name: BLINK ROAD - Kpop Road Dancing
description:
WE ARE BLINK AND WE LOVE KPOP

Are you ready for a thrilling ride?
Most exciting running - hopping - sliding Ball Game!
The running ball starts simply and ramps up shortly.


*** HOT UPDATE ***

- BLINK ROAD Road! is a game that challenges your reflexes and reaction time.
- Play now and feel new BLINK music challenges wherever you are.
- BLINK ROAD Road!, You can play games with lots of attractive KPOP music.
- BLINK ROAD Road! will be the best music game for you!


*** HOW TO PLAY ***

- Hold and drag your ball to hit ones that have the same color!
- Dodge the different color balls!
- Try to Collect all the coins and gift boxes on the road!


*** GAME FEATURES ***

- Control with 1 touch, easy to control.
- Extreme 3D graphics and effects.
- 45+ good KPOP songs to play and relax for BLINK.
- 20+ wallpapers and effects bring fun experience every time you play.
- Collect the personality Ball Costume.

BLINK ROAD Road! will create an extremely interesting experience for anyone who loves KPOP music.
Enjoy the addictive music and challenges designed for each road.
Let's play and train your Eyes Coordination!

All free! Play BLINK ROAD Road! today!
